title: (x) Mary Doria Russell "The Sparrow" headers and body copy - Charlemagne, Sabon {Patricia, Yves}
content:
An imaged is attached. Anyone know the heading and body texts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194120im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/untitled_6551.PNG)

 [‹ (x) "Avalon Hotel" Industria-like sans and '50s Script - Japan Script, alternate Futura by Renner {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194120/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36883 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Embroidery fonts - Berthold City, ITC Zapf Chancery, Kaufmann {Jan E, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194120/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36896 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fathairyape

comments.content:
hi there:

if possible post a zoomed in image please

:-)
The serif text face probably is Sabon.
No need to bump — both typefaces were successfully identified as Charlemagne and Sabon. ;^)
